Articles.Content:
I just started playing this game three days ago. I am absolutely hooked!

Sincemy google history now consists of primarily search results on this site I have signed up.

I have already been around the mun. Trying to make a lander now.

Hello charsi and welcome to the forum!

You will not only find this place to be an excellent resource, it's also filled with others who are passionate about KSP.


Happy landings!

Nice to see you on the forums! Good luck on landing!

It took me forever to land on the Mun... And you're doing it in three days...
